title: Google Messages has a bunch of new features rolling out to everyone
content:
Google Messages is the default SMS texting application on most Android devices, with the added benefit of supporting Google’s RCS network, providing additional features like typing indicators and larger file attachments in conversations where other participants are using Messages. Today the company is officially announcing several new features coming to Messages, though many of them

The post Google Messages has a bunch of new features rolling out to everyone appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google Messages now has a slew of new features, including iMessage reaction support for everyone and new sorting options.
